summary: Replaces imperial Septims with a currency that Nords can really get behind... fluttershys!
descriptionHtml:
This replaces the gold of the empire with fluttergold/ sqeeptims.... does it with textures and a esp.

uses art by kintexu2  so thank them for this, not me
[url=http://kintexu2.deviantart.com/art/One-Squee-Coin-273460740]http://kintexu2.deviantart.com/art/One-Squee-Coin-273460740[/url]

try [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12430]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12430[/url] if you like the idea of fluttershy on your gold, but want a different look

 -issues-
a bit of artifacting/pixalation in the normal maps at certain angles (far less than before)

esp moves your gold 1 letter up alphabetically, so if your worried about not having your gold in with the G\'s, just remove / deactivate the esp.


oh yeah, \" My Little Pony \" is proprety of Hasbro huda huda huda  and so on and so forth, legal jargon and all that jazz.
author: kintexu2 from deviant art
